addon.description: Whether tech is a passion, or something you deal with because you have to, you'll find something useful in every episode of TekThing: product reviews, how-to's, breakdowns on the big stories, and interviews with best experts around!
addon.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the Tekthing.com thread on the Kodi.tv forum
addon.name: Tekthing
